The map of a fabulous treasure buried pirate was cut into three parts by an old buccaneer and divided among his three sons . Several years later , in the second half of the seventeenth century , one of these children , their share passes the map to your daughter, a sexy adventurer who fought as well as any man and had his head put the prize.
